item.title: Kevin Smith and Superman Lives
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Kevin Smith talks about his involvement in "Superman Lives" the dead Superman project with Tim Burton and Nicolas Cage originally attached. I love this sort of thing because it shows a bit of how Hollywood thinks and how it treats comic book properties. The direct link to the video on YouTube if it doesn't work in the embedded player.
